SMTPServer.description: A string that contains the name or IP address of the host computer used for SMTP transactions.

Port.description: The port number on the SMTP host. The default value is 25.

EnableSSL.description: Specify wheter the SmtpClient uses Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) to encrypt the connection.

Username.description: Credential username used for connecting to the SMTP client.

Password.description: Credential password used for connecting to the SMTP client.
